TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileNameEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

Docs.summary: Provides a user interface for selecting a file name.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor> provides a file selection dialog box for file name selection and editing.
## Examples The following code example uses an <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> to associate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor> with a property.
[!code-cpp[EditorAttributesExample#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/CPP/class1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[EditorAttributesExample#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/CS/class1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[EditorAttributesExample#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/VB/class1.vb#5)]

block.para: You may inherit from this class to provide your own title for the dialog and your own file list filter extensions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object EditValue (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, IServiceProvider provider, object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object EditValue(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.IServiceProvider provider, object value) cil managed

Docs.param: An that can be used to gain additional context information.
A service provider object through which editing services may be obtained.
An instance of the value being edited.
Docs.summary: Edits the specified object using the editor style provided by the method.
Docs.returns: The new value of the object. If the value of the object hasn't changed, this should return the same object it was passed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A service provider is provided so that any required editing services can be obtained.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle GetEditStyle(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: An that can be used to gain additional context information.
Docs.summary: Gets the editing style used by the method.
Docs.returns: One of the values indicating the provided editing style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor.EditValue%2A> method is not supported, this method will return <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle.None>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void InitializeDialog(class System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog openFileDialog) cil managed

Docs.param: The to use to select a file name.
Docs.summary: Initializes the open file dialog when it is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method configures the dialog box with a generic file filter and title.

block.para: You can override this method to customize the initialization of the dialog.
